org.smartfrog.services.www.dbc
Interface DeployByCopyServer

All Superinterfaces:
JavaWebApplicationServer, java.rmi.Remote
All Known Implementing Classes:
DeployByCopyServerImpl
public interface DeployByCopyServer
extends JavaWebApplicationServer

Base interface for any app server that supports deploy-by-copy deployment.

Child components can implement startup and shutdown behaviour, so functional implementations can be made without writing new java classes. created 19-Jun-2006 15:53:32

Constant Field Values

ATTR_START_COMPONENT

static final java.lang.String ATTR_START_COMPONENT
Component description of to start during startup. This component is terminated during shutdown, after the shutdown component is deployed "startup"

See Also:
Constant Field Values

ATTR_SHUTDOWN_COMPONENT

static final java.lang.String ATTR_SHUTDOWN_COMPONENT
Component description of to start during shutdown. It is actually created earlier on, after startup succeeds, so that it is ready for use when termination time comes around. "shutdown"

See Also:
Constant Field Values

ATTR_SYNCHRONOUS_COPY

static final java.lang.String ATTR_SYNCHRONOUS_COPY
Flag to control whether or not a copy is synchronous. "synchronousCopy"
